What is a Hybrid Dedicated Server?

A hybrid dedicated server combines the benefits of dedicated servers with the flexibility of virtualized infrastructure. It is less expensive than regular dedicated servers and are an excellent choice for stores and web applications that have outgrown their existing hosting environment. The scalability features allow for hybrid dedicated server customers to upgrade resources at anytime, and deploy servers on the fly!

Plenty of Operating System Options to Choose From, Linux and Windows

A wide array of operating system options are available for you to choose from. Choose from Linux, Windows, and more. Don't see an ISO you want? Contact us to get your ISO mounted.
